original_text:
but with righteousness he shall judge the poor,
    and decide with equity for the meek of the earth;
and he shall strike the earth with the rod of his mouth,
    and with the breath of his lips he shall kill the wicked.
korean_text: 공의로 가난한 자를 심판하며 정직으로 세상의 겸손한 자를 판단할 것이며 그의 입의 막대기로 세상을 치며 그의 입술의 기운으로 악인을 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: but with righteousness he shall judge the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 의로움으로 가난한 자를 심판하리라

sentences.original_text: and decide with equity for the meek of the earth
and he shall strike the earth with the rod of his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 입의 막대기로 땅을 치리라

sentences.original_text: and with the breath of his lips he shall kill the wicked
